title: Can't figure out the font of this logo.
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130821042355im_/http:/typophile.com/files/xxxxx_pic11_4229.jpg)

I've used this font in the past but I can't seem to find it anymore... can someone help identify this font... I need it to recreate the logo above... thanks in advance.
author: cmonkey

comments.content: If it's not an actual typeface, it should be easy to recreate: it's all straight lines at variants of 0°, 45° and 90°…
It does resemble Stephen Moye's Architext or Artlookin.
